description:
Elesis is a talented knight and older sister of http://anidb.net/ch87449 [Elsword]. She is able to evade and gap close with extreme effect unlike her brother Elsword, who incorporates a more defensive fighting style. In addition to her swordplay with her claymore, Elesis is capable of harnessing and expressing energy into fire, enhancing her combat efficiency.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Elesis
